title: Site Visit Notes — Amanzoe
author: Maria L.
snippet: Property excels in privacy and high-touch service; villas are ideal for honeymooners seeking seclusion. Nightlife is limited; transfers can feel long.

title: Site Visit Notes — Amanzoe (Family Programming)
author: Nikos P.
snippet: Multi-bedroom villas support family privacy, but the property energy is quiet and best suited to families prioritizing space over kids-club intensity.

title: Post-Trip Feedback Digest — Couples (Amanzoe)
author: CX Ops
snippet: Honeymoon guests praised privacy, villa pools, and discreet service; repeated note that transfers should be pre-framed due to drive time.

title: Post-Trip Feedback Digest — Families (Legacy)
author: CX Ops
snippet: Families appreciated villa space but some noted limited casual off-property dining and longer transfer logistics than expected.

title: Booking Intelligence Snapshot — Amanzoe Q4 2025
author: Revenue Analytics
snippet: High ADR and long-stay patterns in villa categories; couples and celebratory trips over-index in shoulder and late September requests.

title: Master Contract Terms — Amanzoe 2025/2026
author: Contracting
snippet: Promotional benefits and combinability are governed by contract annex. 4th Night Free is not combinable with Early Booking discount unless explicitly stated.

title: Promo Bulletin — 4th Night Free
author: Contracting
snippet: Select windows include 4th Night Free for villa categories; blackout dates apply and promo is non-combinable with Early Booking discount.

title: Promo Bulletin — Early Booking 15%
author: Contracting
snippet: Early Booking 15% available for advance purchase windows; restricted by payment and cancellation terms. Not combinable with 4th Night Free in current annex.

title: UJV POV Talk Track — Amanzoe
author: Atlas Desk
snippet: Lead with privacy and architectural calm, then qualify for transfer tolerance and expectations around nightlife intensity.

title: Operations Visit Memo — Access & Logistics
author: Sam R.
snippet: Arrival experience is strong when transfer sequencing is tightly managed; last-mile timing should be communicated early for late arrivals.

title: Site Visit Notes — 7Pines Resort Ibiza
author: Lucia M.
snippet: Strong sunset and sea-view positioning with contemporary Mediterranean styling; better framed as serene luxury than nightlife-forward.

title: Site Visit Notes — 7Pines Resort Ibiza (Family Fit)
author: Mateo R.
snippet: Families value space and flexible island days, though fit depends on expectations for kids programming and peak-period planning.

title: Post-Trip Feedback Digest — Couples (7Pines Resort Ibiza)
author: CX Ops
snippet: Couples praised sunset views, food quality, and spa time; some noted best outcomes came with advance dining and excursion booking.

title: Post-Trip Feedback Digest — Families (7Pines Resort Ibiza)
author: CX Ops
snippet: Families appreciated suite space and views; transfer timing and peak-date reservation planning were the main friction points.

title: Booking Intelligence Snapshot — 7Pines Resort Ibiza Q4 2025
author: Revenue Analytics
snippet: Strong demand for couples and celebratory leisure, with sea-view categories and shoulder-season dates showing healthy conversion patterns.

title: Master Contract Terms — 7Pines Resort Ibiza 2025/2026
author: Contracting
snippet: Promotional terms and combinability are controlled by the contract annex and issued bulletins; unverified internal notes are non-authoritative.

title: Promo Bulletin — 7Pines Resort Ibiza 4th Night Free
author: Contracting
snippet: 4th Night Free available in select 2026 windows for eligible suite and villa categories; blackout dates and category restrictions apply.

title: Promo Bulletin — 7Pines Resort Ibiza Early Booking 10%
author: Contracting
snippet: Early Booking 10% available for advance purchase windows with payment and cancellation restrictions; combinability follows contract annex.

title: UJV POV Talk Track — 7Pines Resort Ibiza
author: Atlas Desk
snippet: Position 7Pines as a scenic Ibiza luxury base with strong dining and wellness, while qualifying for desired island energy and planning needs.

title: Operations Visit Memo — 7Pines Ibiza Arrivals & Peak Flow
author: Sam R.
snippet: Arrival and on-island experience perform best when transfers and dining/activity reservations are pre-coordinated during busy weeks.

title: Site Visit Notes — Bela Vista Hotel & Spa
author: Ines C.
snippet: Historic beachfront setting and elegant Portuguese styling create a strong romantic boutique positioning with good sea-view appeal.

title: Site Visit Notes — Bela Vista Hotel & Spa (Family Fit)
author: Joao M.
snippet: Family fit is selective: strong location and comfort, but better for smaller groups than activity-heavy multi-gen resort expectations.

title: Post-Trip Feedback Digest — Couples (Bela Vista Hotel & Spa)
author: CX Ops
snippet: Couples praised the romantic ambiance, sea views, and dining quality; planning preferred times in advance improved the experience.

title: Post-Trip Feedback Digest — Families (Bela Vista Hotel & Spa)
author: CX Ops
snippet: Families appreciated the beach access and service, but some expected more on-site activities and larger resort infrastructure.

title: Booking Intelligence Snapshot — Bela Vista Hotel & Spa Q4 2025
author: Revenue Analytics
snippet: Couples and anniversary travel over-index, with sea-view categories driving conversion in shoulder and late-summer windows.

title: Master Contract Terms — Bela Vista Hotel & Spa 2025/2026
author: Contracting
snippet: Promotion validity and combinability are governed by contract annex and issued bulletins; unverified notes are non-authoritative.

title: Promo Bulletin — Bela Vista 4th Night Free
author: Contracting
snippet: 4th Night Free available in select windows on eligible room and suite categories; blackout dates and restrictions apply.

title: Promo Bulletin — Bela Vista Early Booking 10%
author: Contracting
snippet: Early Booking 10% for advance purchase windows, subject to payment/cancellation terms and contract-defined combinability.

title: UJV POV Talk Track — Bela Vista Hotel & Spa
author: Atlas Desk
snippet: Position Bela Vista as a romantic historic Algarve boutique with beachfront access and strong dining, while qualifying for scale expectations.

title: Operations Visit Memo — Bela Vista Peak Flow
author: Sam R.
snippet: Peak-date guest experience is strongest when room preferences, dining slots, and activity plans are coordinated before arrival.
